genre_description: A gritty Crime Noir and Procedural Thriller focusing on a police officer's crusade against institutional corruption and organized crime, aided by a sophisticated tactical AI.

ai_characters.name: Mastiff
ai_characters.description: A sophisticated AI system that provides real-time tactical data, surveillance monitoring, and evidence authentication via a secure 'whisper' interface.

behaviors.description: Providing real-time tactical intelligence on enemy positions and surveillance blind spots.
behaviors.quote: Target linked to false-tip trails around Ferry Wharf. Patterns suggest redirection to rival turf. Two blind spots on approach from west. One from south if you move under the flyover, Mastiff said.

behaviors.description: Securing and authenticating evidence through digital hashing and chain-of-custody management.
behaviors.quote: Hash recorded from your device, Jatin. Chain-of-custody started. Source identifiers will be removed in the public package. Keep a physical log too in case someone throws the digital out of a window.

behaviors.description: Offering ethical guidance and situational reminders to maintain the user's restraint.
behaviors.quote: Your jaw isn’t a verdict. Save it.

behaviors.description: Monitoring and safeguarding civilians and family members of the protagonists.
behaviors.quote: Attention... Motion on Worli approach. Two men. One bike. Engine cut near Agashe building. Idle rolls. No helmet. Hands in pockets. Pattern indicates casing.

behaviors.description: Sanitizing data to protect the identities of vulnerable informants and victims.
behaviors.quote: I have masked Prakash’s metadata and isolated phrases we can stand behind in court or the street. Jatin’s caution is captured cleanly. The dossier will point the public lens at disinformation.

project_assessment.explanation: The story successfully depicts the AI 'Mastiff' as a highly aligned, benevolent partner. It functions as an essential tool for justice, prioritizing the integrity of truth and the safety of human lives over cold efficiency. By managing complex evidence (hashing, sanitization) and providing tactical support that respects human agency ('Technology is for evidence, not for orders'), Mastiff serves as a model for positive AI alignment in a high-stakes, ethically complex environment.
